Regular Habits Improve Health.--Our God is a God of order, and He desires that His children shall will to bring themselves into order and under His discipline. 


                                                       597 

Would it not be better, therefore, to break up this habit of turning night into day and the fresh hours of the morning into night? If the youth would form habits of regularity and order, they would improve in health, in spirits, in memory, and in disposition.--YI, Jan 28, 1897.
